plugin_info.plugin_description: Import a network saved as ESRI Shapefile into Hydra.
plugin_info.plugin_epilog: Written by Philipp Meier, philipp@diemeiers.ch (c) Copyright 2015 Eawag: Swiss Federal Institute of Aquatic Science and Technology For more information visit www.hydraplatform.org

arg.name: Links file
arg.help: The filename of the links to be imported.

arg.name: Nodes file
arg.help: The filename of the nodes to be imported. If no node file is specified, nodes are created automatically from the start and endpoints of links.
